Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2024
Author: Sarah
Title: Classic, simple, gorgeous!
Body: This is EXACTLY what I needed! I‚Äôve been storing my thousands of earrings and bracelets in their original boxes for the past 5 years, and am so sick of losing things or forgetting what I have. I always think back to when I was a little girl and liked looking though my Mom‚Äôs wooden jewelry box, and how organized it looked. So glad I found this one!!It‚Äôs made really well and even smelled like wood when I took it out of the box. Came packaged nicely so it was protected during shipping. There‚Äôs plenty of space for all of my things! Love the bottom drawer.I don‚Äôt think you can go wrong with it! I kind of wish it had a darker wood stain, but this is timeless. üëçüèº

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2024
Author: Tzu-Jung
Title: Stylish and practical
Body: Absolutely love this jewelry box! The three-layer design makes it super easy to keep everything organized, and the removable dividers give me flexibility to store different types of jewelry. The solid wood construction feels durable, and the vintage finish adds a nice, rustic touch to my room.The glass lid is a game changer, it looks classy and makes finding my go-to pieces so much easier. Plus, the linen lining is soft and keeps my jewelry from getting scratched. Overall, it‚Äôs beautiful, functional, and would make an amazing gift. Totally worth it!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2024
Author: MissyinDC
Title: Beautiful wood, solid construction
Body: I am very happy with this jewelry box. It was everything I was looking for. Classic, with a mid-century look, and built to last. It was packaged carefully and is made with solid wood with a spacious linen-lined interior. The drawer moves smoothly and the glass top is great for easily and quickly seeing what I need. The only change I would request is for a soft close top, but that‚Äôs only because I‚Äôm clumsy and sometimes forgetful and could see the top slamming shut unexpectedly and the glass possibly breaking. Though the glass appears to be thick and sturdy. That said, this is otherwise perfect and a good value for a solid wooden piece. I‚Äôm thinking about ordering the larger size as well!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2024
Author: Lion
Title: Even nicer in person than in the product photos
Body: My expectations were low as I had just done a review for a jewelry box more expensive than this one that was made poorly. Much to my surprise, this gorgeous real wood jewelry box showed up at my doorstep. It‚Äôs the perfect size for all of my earrings, bracelets, watches, and broaches. The one limitation is there‚Äôs no hanging space for necklaces, but this box is gorgeous enough that even if you need another little rack for necklaces it could still be worth it for you.The drawers sit flush and open smoothly, the lid stays up when opened, the glass top is high quality, I honestly can‚Äôt find any drawbacks. I‚Äôm in love!!!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2024
Author: Hallmen House
Title: Beautiful And Timeless
Body: Pros: I really enjoy the simplicity of the design and the beauty of the craftsmanship. The wood is solid and put together very nicely. All of the surfaces and edges are smooth and the corners and drawers are seamlessly joined. The hinges work well and have no resistance or sound when being used. The dividers are strong and not flimsy pieces of cardboard. The pillow rolls for holding rings are sturdy but soft and have a good hold so nothing will fall out.The glass top offers a nice peek into the contents and grabs my attention, which I enjoy because I have been wearing and switching out my pieces more often. The style is great because it can match a farmhouse aesthetic or a modern aesthetic, great for teens or adults and would make a great gift.  The jewelry box came with 4 little rubber ‚Äòdot‚Äô feet already attached on the bottom to prevent it from slipping and to keep the wood in good condition. The light linen fabric inside adds a nice modern touch and offers protection to the jewelry so they don‚Äôt get scratched or tangled as easily. This box feels like an heirloom style piece that could have been handed down to me, and will see be beautiful when I hand it down to the next person. I really like this jewelry box.Cons: When first opening the package the smell was quite strong. I believe it‚Äôs the adhesive used to hold the linen fabric and dividers into place. The smell did go away after 48 hours though.I really enjoy this jewelry box.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 23, 2024
Author: Mom
Title: Real Wood and Nicely Made
Body: I'm so glad to have finally found a nice wooden jewelry box on amazon. So many are particle board with a plastic wood grain veneer, or poorly made. Not this one. It's real wood with a glass lid and well constructed. I like the simple design. The only thing I would change is to make the interior a dark colored velvet instead of linen. The linen looks nice now, but over time it may develop yellow oxidation stains.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2024
Author: Deanna D
Title: Real Wood‚Ä¶REALLY!
Body: It is difficult to find wooden jewelry boxes anymore so when I saw this one I did not hesitate to order it. Fortunately, it looks even better than the photos depict. The quality of every aspect is perfect! The wood is finished to a tee. It reminds me of the retro 60‚Äôs look or Shaker style with the sleek design and smooth appearance. I appreciate that the drawer comes out completely as sometimes items fall behind them. The hinges on the lid are solid and work well. I even love the linen material which will help keep dirt from sticking like felt does. Lovely!!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2024
Author: SW
Title: Glass window
Body: Sturdy, well made solid wood jewelry box with velvet lining. Has generous deep bottom drawer. Glass lid. Good square size. Can hold quote a few pieces of jewelry. Giftable and recommended.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2024
Author: Extraordinary Girl
Title: Beautiful jewelry box, perfect for any female in your life!
Body: This jewelry box is exquisite! The fine, honey colored wood, the open glass top which helps you to spot what you‚Äôre looking for before you even open the box, and the beautiful lightest tan lining and spacious areas for all different types of jewelry makes this high quality jewelry box a perfect gift for a woman or any age!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2024
Author: A
Title: beautiful box
Body: came perfectly packaged. gorgeous wood!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 23, 2024
Author: Shoeless
Title: nice quality
Body: This jewelry box is nice quality. It looks nice, and the wood & glass are genuine and not flimsy. There are 3 levels with space for jewelry.  I ran out of room in my larger jewelry organizer, so this is a good way for me to store & protect additional jewelry items.  I like that I can easily se through the top glass what is stored there. I'd recommend this Clasin Jewelry Box to anyone needing one this size.

Author: krazimom
Title: Finally Organized
Body: My jewelry had been stored in one box with no dividers. It was so hard to find things and the necklaces were getting all tangled I am thrilled with this jewelry box I can finally get everything organized. There is so many different compartments for storing jewelry

Body: Looked cheap and not worth the price you‚Äôre paying for this. I‚Äôd find something else‚Ä¶

Body: A little more on the big side, thought it was going to be smaller but looks nice.

Author: Lori
Title: Nice!
Body: A nice basic box, which was what I wanted. Seems well-made and a good design.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2024
Author: Kindle Customer
Title: Sturdy organizer
Body: The organizer was very well packaged. The wood is pretty sturdy. The top is actual glass and not plastic. It did have a weird, strong smell when opened so it needs to be aired out for a few days. It is slightly on the smaller side but really good quality

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2024
Author: Tony Rollo
Title: Beautiful, sturdy wood -
Body: .Very nice quality jewelry boxes. The glass top is a sign of luxury. The wood is well sanded smooth and expertly stained.The two drawers adds a lot of convenience, one with three long sections, and one open for larger things. Overall great quality and is a good value.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2024
Author: BaileyLoo
Title: Cheaply made
Body: The lid is not glass, but very cheap plastic.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2024
Author: Jaspernut
Title: Nice looking jewelry box
Body: This is a nice solid wood box with a clear glass top.  The 2 drawers allow you to organize the way that best suits you.  The drawers are easy to open with their tiny handles although the top lid does not have a handle and is harder to pry up.  The construction feels high quality and well made.  The wood is nicely finished and the simple mid tone will go with most decors

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2024
Author: JM
Title: Beautiful little jewelry box
Body: This jewelry box is super cute. It‚Äôs small, but definitely great for your collection of jewelry. It has a nice glass top and sturdy fabric on the inside. The bottom drawer does pull out and occasionally falls out easily but it‚Äôs some thing you get used to. Also, the color of the wood is nice but I wish it was more of a natural walnut tone but overall everything works great for a simple box.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2024
Author: Samantha
Title: Elegant and Functional Jewelry Box
Body: This jewelry box is a beautiful and practical way to keep your accessories organized. The three-layer design offers ample storage space, and the removable dividers allow you to customize the compartments to fit your needs. The solid pine wood construction is sturdy and durable, and the natural vintage color adds a touch of charm.I love the glass lid, which allows me to easily see my jewelry without having to open the box. The linen lining is also a nice touch, as it helps protect my pieces from scratches. Overall, this is a great jewelry box that is both stylish and functional.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2024
Author: Rex C.
Title: Good craftsmanship
Body: This subtly designed jewelry box is practical, useful and works well. It's clean lines and soft tones offer functional, practicality and reliability on a budget. The drawers and lid operate smoothly and the base came with protective pads pre-installed. Very nice.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2024
Author: Heather H.
Title: Great for Convenient Access to Frequently Worn Items, High Quality Wooden Box
Body: This is a lovely looking and functional jewelry storage box. The solid wood construction is both sturdy and durable. The hinges keep the glass lid firmly affixed and the lid opens and closes with ease. The drawer underneath the main compartment slides in and out smoothly. As far as the interior is concerned it is well designed. The compartments are of good usable sizes that can accommodate a variety of different types of jewelry. The linen lining is consistent throughout and without raw or rough edges. I do not feel that it is accurate to call the linen lining soft, as a matter of fact it is rather course. This being said, it is not scratchy to the point where it would damage jewelry. Personally I greatly prefer a velvet lining, but this lining is perfectly fine. The box really does stand out for being a functional storage piece. It doesn't take up too much room, holds a lot, looks nice, and is well made. It is well suited to my needs too. I ordered this as extra jewelry box. My very large stand up jewelry box holds the majority of my jewelry, but the stuff that I wear on a frequent basis has now found a home in this new box. It affords convenient access. Great buy.
